goals__remit:
EATAN is a non-profit organisation that works to address inequalities in healthcare access and poor health outcomes among migrants across Europe.  
 
EATAN works to improve the quality of life of migrants at risk of or living with HIV, viral hepatitis, TB and other chronic conditions and to enhance their involvement and participation in key screening, treatment and care decisions. We work with key stakeholders to influence policy and best practise and empower migrant communities in Europe by providing information; building skills and availing resources to enable them fully access health services and make informed choices about their healthcare.
